column4: how do I launch the text mode installer from USB...? the graphic sucks and doesn't have all options...
i think you need the alternate installer CD
are there NO grub launch option i could put into the usb booter to launch a text installer instead of the ubuntu test desktop????
so i need to redownload the whole thing... transfer it to the usb again to get text installer?
none i know of. searching the forums or google might quite easily prove me wrong, i've never had to do a non-graphical install with ubuntu
yeah i think so, what exactly are you not getting in the GUI installer that you want?
